Text.Page:
The Red Lash pirates moved in force to Mistmoor Island. And they're spending more time on land than we'd like.

The pirates were actually easier to deal with when they had a full-fledged fleet, believe it or not.

Report to Vindicator Outpost, on the southern coast of Mistmoor Island. They'll put you to work.

Munam sent you? And not just to get a "left-handed wrench" or a "campfire smoke sample?" Either he's distracted or worried.

And he should be worried. The Red Lash pirates are everywhere. They're working with a bunch of gula slavers called the Kazuur Syndicate.

So welcome to Mistmoor Island. Come for the sandy beaches, stay for the target-rich environment.
